snippet: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany tried to repair a relationship with France, but doubts remained about President François Hollande’s resolve to make tough economic decisions.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel and French Pres Francois Hollande appear united after they agree on common approach to next European Union meeting, but doubts remain about Hollande's resolve to make tough economic decisions.
lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany tried to repair a relationship with France, but doubts remained about President François Hollande’s resolve to make tough economic decisions.

headline.seo: Small Agreements Between France and Germany Mask Larger Concerns
headline.main: Small Agreements Between France and Germany Mask Larger Concerns
headline.print_headline: Small Agreements Between France and Germany Mask Larger Concerns
